title: Home - Alternative Medicine Brewing Co.
author: Jordan
cleaned_text: The Official Craft Beer of Rugby New York Hours Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday: Closed Thursday & Friday: 5pm to Suite 1A, Mount Vernon, NY 10550](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Alternative+Medicine+Brewing+Company/@40.9126274,-73.8346298,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x89c28de93121ba67:0x6a61bd3f030bfedf!8m2!3d40.912459!4d-73.8324239?swcfpc=1) Getting Here [Our entrance is across the street from 7 Portugal Place](https://www.google.com/maps/place/40%C2%B054'45.5%22N+73%C2%B049'56.4%22W/@40.9126493,-73.832868,19z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x0:0x5c833dc817530280!8m2!3d40.9126493!4d-73.8323208?swcfpc=1) and about 100ft from the Mount Vernon East Metro North Station.
